title: Lawsuits allege dancing doctor was negligent
content: Voting is open for the fourth annual 4393 Awards, a reader survey honoring the best of the best in our area! Here's your chance to vote for your favorite restaurants, shops, local heroes and more. The voting period will run through June 14, and winners will be announced July 19 in a special section published in the Waterbury Record, Stowe Reporter and News & Citizen, and distributed through the fall at select retail outlets. An electronic version of the section will live online until next year’s winners are announced.   Vote Now!
